title: Wanted: low-grade 1914 Fatima T222 Archer, McLean, Reulbach, or Vitt
author: Spike

posts.post_title: Wanted: low-grade 1914 Fatima T222 Archer, McLean, Reulbach, or Vitt
posts.post_content:
P-F Reulbach recently sold on eBay for $37 + $3 shipping. Would pay the same or happy to trade.

To clarify, seeking any of these (#5 in lower-left).

Archer
McLean
Reulbach
Vitt
